properties.areaDesc: S of Cape Lookout NC to Surf City NC out to 20 nm; S of Oregon Inlet NC to Cape Hatteras NC out to 20 nm; S of Cape Hatteras NC to Ocracoke Inlet NC out to 20 nm; S of Ocracoke Inlet NC to Cape Lookout NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 19 at 9:45PM EST until February 21 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 30 to 40 kt with gusts up to 50 kt and seas 9
to 14 ft expected.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Oregon Inlet to Surf City.

* WHEN...Thursday afternoon through early Friday evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THURSDAY TO 7 PM EST FRIDAY
